verbs.description: icebox cookies this cookie recipe from [ARG1: my 91-year - old grandmother] [V: was] [ARG2: my grandfather favorite] she still makes them and sends us home with the dough so that we can make more whenever we want i love to make a fresh batch when company drops in —chris paulsen glendale arizona
